ygData.subject: this is m.peanut1@juno.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, everyone.  My cleric is now 5, my wizard is 9 and in the Nobles of the High Sky guild, and I started at mage that is now lvl 4.  Oh, and I started a
ygData.messageBody:
Well, everyone. My cleric is now 5, my wizard is 9 and in the Nobles of
the High Sky guild, and I started at mage that is now lvl 4. Oh, and I
started a enchanter, but haven't worked on it, it is still lvl 1.

Best wishes from Kirsten


"I am not afraid of death, because when I die. The suffering will end,
there will be no more pain. For after death, comes a new life with God
the Father in heaven."
"Horses are the most magnificent animal, for they fly without wings and
conquer without sword."
"Wizards and Clerics are by far the best class in EverQuest and we all
know that High Elves rule the world."
